scripts.minify:js: terser public/js/app.js -o public/js/app.min.js -c -m && terser public/js/comments.js -o public/js/comments.min.js -c -m
scripts.minify:html: html-minifier-terser --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css true --minify-js true public/index.html -o public/index.min.html && html-minifier-terser --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments public/comments.html -o public/comments.min.html
scripts.build: npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js && npm run minify:html
